LanguageData.VAEI_SanityLetterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef}’s sanity has been tested by recent events. The sanity level of your colonists can now be seen on the Needs tab.
LanguageData.VAEI_SanityLossMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} has lost sanity due to {0}. {PAWN_nameDef}’s sanity is now {1}
LanguageData.VAEI_SanityGainMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} has gained sanity due to {0}. {PAWN_nameDef}’s sanity is now {1}
LanguageData.VEAI_ConsumedTwistedMeatAsIngredient: Eating twisted meat as food ingredient
LanguageData.VAEI_SanityLoss: It occurred due to sanity loss to 0%.
LanguageData.VAEI_InhumanizedDesc:
{PAWN_nameDef}’s connection to humanity is broken. {PAWN_possessive}'s transformation has left {PAWN_possessive} detached from human sensibilities, no longer swayed by pain or social interactions, and indifferent to the aesthetics of beauty and the outdoors. {PAWN_possessive} mind, now attuned to the void, disregards most emotions, finding solace in void meditation and a mysterious, unyielding joy that permeates {PAWN_possessive} existence.

{PAWN_pronoun} has gained the inhumanized trait.

Though drastically altered, {PAWN_nameDef} is still part of your faction, just disconnected from the typical human experiences.
LanguageData.VAEI_RecoveredDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has emerged from the depths of madness, experiencing a catharsis that has restored a measure of sanity to {PAWN_possessive} mind. The suffocating grip of the void that once dominated {PAWN_possessive} thoughts has loosened, granting {PAWN_possessive} a fragile peace. Though the journey back to full sanity will be lengthy, {PAWN_possessive} has regained crucial aspects of {PAWN_possessive} mental clarity.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} has begun the slow process of recovery, and did not become inhumanized on this occasion.
LanguageData.VAEI_SacrificialDesc:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s connection to humanity is broken. {PAWN_possessive} transformation has left {PAWN_possessive} detached from human sensibilities, no longer swayed by pain or social interactions, and indifferent to the aesthetics of beauty and the outdoors. {PAWN_possessive} mind, now attuned to the void, disregards most emotions, finding solace in void meditation and a mysterious, unyielding joy that permeates {PAWN_possessive} existence. Compelled by the dark calling, {PAWN_possessive} is now driven to end {PAWN_possessive} existence in a final act of sacrifice to the void.

{PAWN_pronoun} has gained the inhumanized trait.

{PAWN_nameDef} is now set on a path of self-destruction and will attempt to end their existence, however they can still be restrained and stopped if you arrest them in time.
LanguageData.VAEI_EnableSelfHarmContent: Enable self-harm content (sacrificial mental state, self harm interaction)
